pr_title: SAK-44832 Browser console error after button removed in Profile

timeline.bodyText:
You need to remove the i18n string, too.
bundle/src/resources/ProfileApplication.properties
Make sure you remove it from all the translations.
timeline.author: adrianfish

replies.author: MRutea
